@brymcbride @bFlood @billdollins to calculate deltas you just need the Ids (ImmutableGlobalId) from the previous execution for that system
@brymcbride @bFlood @billdollins used the createReplica operation with syncMode none as it needed attachments too
@brymcbride @bFlood @billdollins Assigned GlobalID from the owner to ImmutableGlobalID and used that to work out adds, updates and deletes
@brymcbride @bFlood @billdollins I've done it before with a number of related local Portal instances and ArcGIS Online.
